title.text: RFC 5830: GOST 28147-89: Encryption, Decryption, and Message Authentication Code (MAC) Algorithms

Independent Submission                                  V. Dolmatov, Ed.
Request for Comments: 5830                               Cryptocom, Ltd.
Category: Informational                                       March 2010
ISSN: 2070-1721
GOST 28147-89: Encryption, Decryption, and Message Authentication Code (MAC) Algorithms
contents.zh-CHS: GOST 28147-89：加密、解密和消息认证码（MAC）算法

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document is intended to be a source of information about the Russian Federal standard for electronic encryption, decryption, and message authentication algorithms (GOST 28147-89), which is one of the Russian cryptographic standard algorithms called GOST algorithms). Recently, Russian cryptography is being used in Internet applications, and this document has been created as information for developers and users of GOST 28147-89 for encryption, decryption, and message authentication.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件旨在作为俄罗斯联邦电子加密、解密和消息认证算法标准（GOST 28147-89）的信息来源，GOST 28147-89是俄罗斯加密标准算法之一，称为GOST算法）。最近，俄罗斯密码学正在互联网应用中使用，本文件作为GOST 28147-89开发者和用户的信息，用于加密、解密和消息验证。

1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: 1.1. General Information
contents.zh-CHS: 1.1. 一般资料

contents.text: [GOST28147-89] is the unified cryptographic transformation algorithm for information processing systems of different purposes, defining the encryption/decryption rules and the message authentication code (MAC) generation rules.
contents.zh-CHS: [GOST28147-89]是用于不同用途的信息处理系统的统一密码转换算法，定义了加密/解密规则和消息认证码（MAC）生成规则。

contents.text: This cryptographic transformation algorithm is intended for hardware or software implementation and corresponds to the cryptographic requirements. It puts no limitations on the encrypted information secrecy level.
contents.zh-CHS: 此加密转换算法用于硬件或软件实现，并与加密要求相对应。它对加密信息保密级别没有限制。

contents.text: 2. Applicability
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 适用性

contents.text: GOST 28147-89 defines the encryption/decryption model and MAC generation for a given message (document) that is meant for transmission via insecure public telecommunication channels between data processing systems of different purposes.
contents.zh-CHS: GOST 28147-89定义了用于在不同用途的数据处理系统之间通过不安全公共电信信道传输的给定消息（文档）的加密/解密模型和MAC生成。

contents.text: GOST 28147-89 is obligatory to use in the Russian Federation in all data processing systems providing public services.
contents.zh-CHS: 俄罗斯联邦所有提供公共服务的数据处理系统必须使用GOST 28147-89。

contents.text: 3. Definitions and Notations
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 定义和符号

contents.text: 3.1. Definitions
The following terms are used in the standard:
contents.zh-CHS: 本标准中使用了以下术语：

contents.text: Running key: a pseudo-random bit sequence generated by a given algorithm for encrypting plain texts and decrypting encrypted texts.
contents.zh-CHS: 运行密钥：由给定的加密明文和解密加密文本的算法生成的伪随机位序列。

contents.text: Encryption: the process of transforming plain text to encrypted data using a cipher.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密：使用密码将纯文本转换为加密数据的过程。

contents.text: MAC: an information string of fixed length that is generated from plain text and a key according to some rule and added to the encrypted data for protection against data falsification.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC：一种固定长度的信息字符串，由明文和密钥根据某种规则生成，并添加到加密数据中以防止数据篡改。

contents.text: Key: a defined secret state of some parameters of a cryptographic transformation algorithm, that provides a choice of one transformation out of all the possible transformations.
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥：密码转换算法中某些参数的一种已定义的秘密状态，可从所有可能的转换中选择一种转换。

contents.text: Cryptographic protection: data protection using the data cryptographic transformations.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密保护：使用数据加密转换的数据保护。

contents.text: Cryptographic transformation: data transformation using encryption and (or) MAC.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密转换：使用加密和（或）MAC进行数据转换。

contents.text: Decryption: the process of transforming encrypted data to plain text using a cipher.
contents.zh-CHS: 解密：使用密码将加密数据转换为纯文本的过程。

contents.text: Initialisation vector: initial values of plain parameters of a cryptographic transformation algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: 初始化向量：密码转换算法的普通参数的初始值。

contents.text: Encryption equation: a correlation showing the process of generating encrypted data out of plain text as a result of transformations defined by the cryptographic transformation algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密方程：一种相关性，显示了通过加密转换算法定义的转换从纯文本生成加密数据的过程。

contents.text: Decryption equation: a correlation showing the process of generating plain text out of encrypted data as a result of transformations defined by the cryptographic transformation algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: 解密方程：一种相关性，显示加密数据通过加密转换算法定义的转换生成纯文本的过程。

contents.text: Cipher: a set of reversible transformations of the set of possible plain texts onto the set of encrypted data, made after certain rules and using keys.
contents.zh-CHS: 密码：将一组可能的明文转换为一组加密数据的一组可逆转换，按照一定规则并使用密钥进行。

contents.text: 3.2. Notation
In this document, the following notations are used:
contents.zh-CHS: 在本文件中，使用了以下符号：

contents.text: ^ is a power operator.
contents.zh-CHS: ^他是个电力操作员。

contents.text: (+) is a bitwise addition of the words of the same length modulo 2.
contents.zh-CHS: （+）是相同长度的字的按位加法，模为2。

contents.text: [+] is an addition of 32-bit vectors modulo 2^32.
contents.zh-CHS: [+]是模2^32的32位向量的加法。

contents.text: [+]' is an addition of the 32-bit vectors modulo 2^32-1.
contents.zh-CHS: [+]”是模2^32-1的32位向量的加法。

contents.text: 1..N is all values from 1 to N.
contents.zh-CHS: 1..N是从1到N的所有值。

contents.text: 4. General Statements
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 一般性发言

contents.text: The structure model of the cryptographic transformation algorithm (a cryptographic model) contains:
contents.zh-CHS: 密码转换算法的结构模型（密码模型）包含：

contents.text: - a 256-bit key data store (KDS) consisting of eight 32-bit registers (X0, X1, X2, X3, X4, X5, X6, X7);
contents.zh-CHS: - 256位密钥数据存储（KDS），由八个32位寄存器（X0、X1、X2、X3、X4、X5、X6、X7）组成；

contents.text: - four 32-bit registers (N1, N2, N3, N4);
contents.zh-CHS: - 四个32位寄存器（N1、N2、N3、N4）；

contents.text: - two 32-bit registers (N5 and N6) containing constants C1 and C2;
contents.zh-CHS: - 包含常数C1和C2的两个32位寄存器（N5和N6）；

contents.text: - two 32-bit adders modulo 2^32 (CM1, CM3);
contents.zh-CHS: - 两个模为2^32（CM1，CM3）的32位加法器；

contents.text: - a 32-bit adder of bitwise sums modulo 2 (CM2);
contents.zh-CHS: - 一个模为2（CM2）的位和32位加法器；

contents.text: - a 32-bit adder modulo (2^32-1) (CM4);
- an adder modulo 2 (CM5), with no limitation to its width;
contents.zh-CHS: - 模2（CM5）的加法器，不限制其宽度；

contents.text: - a substitution box (K);
contents.zh-CHS: - 替换框（K）；

contents.text: - a register for a cyclic shift of 11 steps to the top digit (R).
contents.zh-CHS: - 一种寄存器，用于将11步循环移位到最高位（R）。

contents.text: A substitution box (S-box) K consists of eight substitution points K1, K2, K3, K4, K5, K6, K7, K8, with 64-bit memory. A 32-bit vector coming to the substitution box is divided into eight successive 4-bit vectors, and each of them is transformed into a 4-bit vector by a corresponding substitution point. A substitution point is a table consisting of 16 lines, each containing four bits. The incoming vector defines the line address in the table, and the contents of that line is the outgoing vector. Then, these 4-bit outgoing vectors are successively combined into a 32-bit vector.
contents.zh-CHS: 替换盒（S盒）K由八个替换点K1、K2、K3、K4、K5、K6、K7、K8组成，具有64位内存。将到达代换框的32位向量划分为八个连续的4位向量，并通过相应的代换点将每个向量转换为4位向量。替换点是由16行组成的表，每行包含四位。传入向量定义表中的行地址，该行的内容就是传出向量。然后，这些4位输出向量依次组合成32位向量。

contents.text: Remark: the standard doesn't define any S-boxes. Some of them are defined in [RFC4357].
contents.zh-CHS: 备注：本标准未定义任何S型盒。其中一些在[RFC4357]中定义。

contents.text: When adding and cyclically shifting binary vectors, the registers with larger numbers are considered the top digits.
contents.zh-CHS: 当添加和循环移位二进制向量时，数字较大的寄存器被视为顶部数字。

contents.text: When writing a key (W1, W2, ..., W256), Wq = 0..1, q = 1..256, in the KDS the value:
- W1 is written into the 1st bit of the register X0;
contents.zh-CHS: - W1被写入寄存器X0的第一位；

contents.text: - the value W2 is written into the 2nd bit of the register X0 (etc.);
contents.zh-CHS: - 值W2被写入寄存器X0的第二位（等）；

contents.text: - the value W32 is written into the 32nd bit of the register X0;
contents.zh-CHS: - 值W32被写入寄存器X0的第32位；

contents.text: - the value W33 is written into the 1st bit of the register X1;
contents.zh-CHS: - 将值W33写入寄存器X1的第一位；

contents.text: - the value W34 is written into the 2nd bit of the register X1 (etc.);
contents.zh-CHS: - 值W34被写入寄存器X1的第二位（以此类推）；

contents.text: - the value W64 is written into the 32nd bit of the register X1;
contents.zh-CHS: - 值W64被写入寄存器X1的第32位；

contents.text: - the value W65 is written into the 1st bit of the register X2 (etc.);
contents.zh-CHS: - 将值W65写入寄存器X2的第一位（以此类推）；

contents.text: - the value W256 is written into the 32nd bit of the register X7.
contents.zh-CHS: - 值W256写入寄存器X7的第32位。

contents.text: When rewriting the information, the value of the p-th bit of one register (adder) is written into the p-th bit of another register (adder).
contents.zh-CHS: 重写信息时，一个寄存器（加法器）的第p位的值写入另一个寄存器（加法器）的第p位。

contents.text: The values of the constants C1 and C2 in the registers N5 and N6 are in the Appendix 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 寄存器N5和N6中常数C1和C2的值见附录1。

contents.text: The keys defining fillings of KDS and the substitution box K tables are secret elements and are provided in accordance with the established procedure.
contents.zh-CHS: 定义KDS和替换框K表的填充的密钥是秘密元素，并按照既定程序提供。

contents.text: The filling of the substitution box K is described in GOST 28147-89 as a long-term key element common for a whole computer network. Usually, K is used as a parameter of algorithm, some possible sets of K are described in [RFC4357].
contents.zh-CHS: GOST 28147-89中描述了替换框K的填充，作为整个计算机网络通用的长期关键要素。通常，K被用作算法的参数，一些可能的K集在[RFC4357]中描述。

contents.text: The cryptographic model contemplates four working modes:
contents.zh-CHS: 密码模型考虑了四种工作模式：

contents.text: - data encryption (decryption) in the electronic codebook (ECB) mode,
contents.zh-CHS: - 电子码本（ECB）模式下的数据加密（解密），

contents.text: - data encryption (decryption) in the counter (CNT) mode,
contents.zh-CHS: - 计数器（CNT）模式下的数据加密（解密），

contents.text: - data encryption (decryption) in the cipher feedback (CFB) mode, and
contents.zh-CHS: - 密码反馈（CFB）模式下的数据加密（解密），以及

contents.text: - the MAC generation mode.
contents.zh-CHS: - MAC生成模式。

contents.text: [RFC4357] also describes the CBC mode of GOST 28147-89, but this mode is not a part of the standard.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC4357]还描述了GOST 28147-89的CBC模式，但该模式不是标准的一部分。

contents.text: 5. The Electronic Codebook Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 电子码本模式

contents.text: 5.1. Encryption of Plain Text in the Electronic Codebook Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1. 电子码本模式下的纯文本加密

contents.text:
The plain text to be encrypted is split into 64-bit blocks.  Input of
a binary data block Tp = (a1(0), a2(0), ... , a31(0), a32(0), b1(0),
b2(0), ..., b32(0)) into the registers N1 and N2 is done so that the
value of a1(0) is put into the first bit of N1, the value of a2(0) is
put into the second bit of N1, etc., and the value of a32(0) is put
into the 32nd bit of N1.  The value of b1(0) is put into the first
bit of N2, the value of b2(0) is put into the 2nd bit of N2, etc.,
and the value of b32(0) is input into the 32nd bit of N2.
The result is the state (a32(0), a31(0), ..., a2(0), a1(0)) of the register N1 and the state (b32(0), b31(0), ..., b1(0)) of the register N2.
The 256 bits of the key are entered into the KDS. The contents of eight 32-bit registers X0, X1, ..., X7 are:
contents.zh-CHS: 密钥的256位被输入KDS。八个32位寄存器X0、X1、…、X7的内容为：

contents.text: The algorithm for enciphering 64-bit blocks of plain text in the electronic codebook mode consists of 32 rounds.
contents.zh-CHS: 在电子码本模式下加密64位纯文本块的算法由32轮组成。

contents.text: In the first round, the initial value of register N1 is added modulo 2^32 in the adder CM1 to the contents of the register X0. Note: the value of register N1 is unchanged.
contents.zh-CHS: 在第一轮中，寄存器N1的初始值被加法器CM1中的模2^32加到寄存器X0的内容中。注：寄存器N1的值不变。

contents.text: The result of the addition is transformed in the substitution block K, and the resulting vector is put into the register R, where it is cyclically shifted by 11 steps towards the top digit. The result of this shift is added bitwise modulo 2 in the adder CM2 to the 32-bit contents of the register N2. The result produced in CM2 is then written into N1, and the old contents of N1 are written in N2. Thus, the first round ends.
contents.zh-CHS: 加法的结果在代换块K中变换，得到的向量被放入寄存器R，在寄存器R中，它被循环地向顶部数字移位11步。该移位的结果将加法器CM2中的按位模2添加到寄存器N2的32位内容中。然后，以CM2为单位生成的结果写入N1，N1的旧内容写入N2。因此，第一轮结束。

contents.text: The subsequent rounds are similar to the first one:
contents.zh-CHS: 随后的几轮与第一轮类似：

contents.text: - in the second round, the contents of X1 are read from the KDS;
contents.zh-CHS: - 在第二轮中，从KDS读取X1的内容；

contents.text: - in the third round, the contents of X2 are read from the KDS, etc.;
contents.zh-CHS: - 在第三轮中，X2的内容从KDS中读取，等等。；

contents.text: - in the 8th round, the contents of X7 are read from the KDS.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在第8轮中，从KDS读取X7的内容。

contents.text: - in rounds 9 through 16 and 17 through 24, the contents of the KDS are read in the same order:
contents.zh-CHS: - 在第9轮至第16轮和第17轮至第24轮中，KDS的内容以相同的顺序读取：

contents.text: - in the last eight rounds from the 25th to the 32nd, the contents of the KDS are read backwards:
contents.zh-CHS: - 在25日至32日的最后八轮中，KDS的内容被向后读取：

contents.text: Thus, during the 32 rounds of encryption, the following order of choosing the registers' contents is implemented:
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，在32轮加密期间，实现了以下选择寄存器内容的顺序：

contents.text: In the 32nd round, the result in the adder CM2 is written into the register N2, and the old contents of register N1 are unchanged.
contents.zh-CHS: 在第32轮中，加法器CM2中的结果写入寄存器N2，并且寄存器N1的旧内容不变。

contents.text: After the 32nd round, the contents of the registers N1 and N2 are an encrypted data block corresponding to a block of plain text.
contents.zh-CHS: 在第32轮之后，寄存器N1和N2的内容是对应于纯文本块的加密数据块。

contents.text: The equations for enciphering in the electronic codebook mode are:
contents.zh-CHS: 电子码本模式下的加密方程为：

contents.text: where:
contents.zh-CHS: 哪里：

contents.text:
a(0) = (a32(0), a31(0), ..., a1(0)) constitutes the initial contents
of N1 before the first round of encryption;

b(0) = (b32(0), b31(0), ..., b1(0)) constitutes the initial contents
of N2 before the first round of encryption;

a(j) = (a32(j), a31(j), ..., a1(j)) constitutes the contents of N1
after the j-th round of encryption;

b(j) = (b32(j), b31(j), ..., b1(j)) constitutes the contents of N2
after the j-th round of encryption, j = 1..32.
R is the operation of cyclic shift towards the top digit by 11 steps, as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: R是向顶部数字循环移位11步的操作，如下所示：

contents.text: The 64-bit block of ciphertext Tc is taken out of the registers N1, N2 in the following order:
contents.zh-CHS: 密文Tc的64位块按以下顺序从寄存器N1、N2中取出：

contents.text: the first, second, ..., 32nd bit of the register N1, then the first, second, ..., 32nd bit of the register N2, i.e.,
contents.zh-CHS: 寄存器N1的第一、第二、…、第32位，然后寄存器N2的第一、第二、…、第32位，即。，

contents.text: The remaining blocks of the plain text in electronic codebook mode are encrypted in the same fashion.
contents.zh-CHS: 电子码本模式下的其余纯文本块以相同方式加密。

contents.text: 5.2. Decryption of the Ciphertext in the Electronic Codebook Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2. 电子码本模式下的密文解密

contents.text: The same 256-bit key that was used for encryption is loaded into the KDS, the encrypted data to be deciphered is divided into 64-bit blocks. The loading of any binary information block
contents.zh-CHS: 将用于加密的相同256位密钥加载到KDS中，将要解密的加密数据划分为64位块。任何二进制信息块的加载

contents.text: into the registers N1 and N2 is done in such a way that:
contents.zh-CHS: 寄存器N1和N2的输入方式如下：

contents.text: - the contents of a1(32) are written into the first bit of N1;
contents.zh-CHS: - a1（32）的内容被写入N1的第一位；

contents.text: - the contents of a2(32) are written into the second bit of N1 (and so on);
contents.zh-CHS: - a2（32）的内容被写入N1的第二位（依此类推）；

contents.text: - the contents of a32(32) are written into the 32nd bit of N1;
contents.zh-CHS: - a32（32）的内容被写入N1的第32位；

contents.text: - the contents of b1(32) are written into the first bit of N2 (and so on);
contents.zh-CHS: - b1（32）的内容写入N2的第一位（依此类推）；

subsequent generation of M blocks of the running key.  The
initialisation vector is put into the registers N1 and N2 so:
- the value of S1 is written into the first bit of N1;
contents.zh-CHS: - S1的值被写入N1的第一位；

contents.text: - the value of S2 is written into the second bit of N1 (etc.);

contents.text:
The initial filling of the registers N1 and N2 (the initialisation
vector S) is encrypted in the electronic codebook mode in accordance
with the requirements from section 5.1.  The result of that
encryption A(S) = (Y0, Z0) is rewritten into the 32-bit registers N3
and N4 so as the contents of N1 are written into N3, and the contents
of N2 are written into N4.

The filling of the register N4 is added modulo (2^32-1) in the adder CM4 to the 32-bit constant C1 from the register N6; the result is written into N4. The filling of the register N3 is added modulo 2^32 in the adder CM3 with the 32-bit constant C2 from the register N5; the result is written into N3.
contents.zh-CHS: 寄存器N4的填充被加法器CM4中的模（2^32-1）加到寄存器N6中的32位常数C1；结果被写入N4。寄存器N3的填充在加法器CM3中以模2^32与来自寄存器N5的32位常数C2相加；结果被写入N3。

contents.text: To get the next 64-bit block of the running key Gc(2), the filling of N4 is added modulo (2^32-1) in the adder CM4 with the constant C1 from N6; the filling of N3 is added modulo 2^32 in the adder CM3 with the constant C2 from N5. The new filling of N3 is copied into N1; the new filling of N4 is copied into N2; the fillings of N3 and N4 are kept.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了获得运行密钥Gc（2）的下一个64位块，在加法器CM4中用来自N6的常数C1模（2^32-1）添加N4的填充；N3的填充是用N5中的常数C2在加法器CM3中模2^32相加的。将N3的新填充复制到N1中；将N4的新填充复制到N2中；保留N3和N4的填充物。

contents.text: The filling of N1 and N2 is encrypted in the electronic codebook mode according to the requirements of section 5.1. The resulting encrypted filling of N1 and N2 is the second 64-bit block of the running key Gc(2); this block is bitwise added modulo 2 in the adder CM5 with the first 64-bit block of the plain text Tp(2). The plain text is divided into 64-bit blocks Tp(1), Tp(2), ..., Tp(M)

contents.text: The initial filling of N1 and N2 (the initialisation vector S) is encrypted in the electronic codebook mode in accordance with the subsection 6.1. The encrypted filling of N1, N2 is the first block of the running key Gc(1) = A(S), this block is added bitwise modulo 2 in the adder CM5 with the encrypted data block Tc(1). This results in the first block of plain text Tp(1).
contents.zh-CHS: 根据第6.1小节，在电子码本模式下对N1和N2（初始化向量S）的初始填充进行加密。N1，N2的加密填充是运行密钥Gc（1）=A（S）的第一块，该块在加法器CM5中与加密数据块Tc（1）按位模2相加。这将导致第一块纯文本Tp（1）。

The block Tc(1) is written in N1 and N2 in accordance with the requirements in the subsection 6.1, the resulted block Gc(2) is added bitwise modulo 2 in the adder CM5 to the second block of the encrypted data Tc(2). This results in the block of plain text Tc(2).

contents.text: 8. Message Authentication Code (MAC) Generation Mode
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 消息身份验证码（MAC）生成模式

contents.text: To provide the protection from falsification of plain text consisting of M 64-bit blocks Tp(1), Tp(2), ..., Tp(M), M >= 2, an additional l-bit block is generated (the message authentication code I(l)). The process of MAC generation is the same for all the encryption/decryption modes.

In the KDS, there exists the same key that is used for encrypting the blocks of plain text Tp(1), Tp(2), ..., Tp(M) in the corresponding blocks of encrypted data Tc(1), Tc(2), ..., Tc(M).

The result of this addition

a2(M-1)[16], ..., a32(M-1)[16], b1(M-1)[16], b2(M-1)[16], ...,
b32(M-1)[16]).

contents.zh-CHS: 在算法的前16轮工作后，被写入N1、N2并以电子码本模式加密。在寄存器N1和N2的结果填充中：

contents.text: an l-bit string I(l) (the MAC) is chosen:
contents.zh-CHS: 选择l位字符串I（l）（MAC）：

contents.text: The MAC I(l) is transmitted through the telecommunication channel or to the computer memory attached to the end of the encrypted data, i.e., Tc(1), Tc(2), ..., Tc(M), I(l).
contents.zh-CHS: MAC I（l）通过电信信道或连接到加密数据端部的计算机存储器，即Tc（1）、Tc（2）、…、Tc（M）、I（l）传输。

contents.text: The encrypted data Tc(1), Tc(2), ..., Tc(M), when arriving, are decrypted, out of the resulting plain text blocks Tp(1), Tp(2), ..., Tp(M). The MAC I'(l) is generated as described in the subsection 5.3 and compared with the MAC I(l) received together with the encrypted data from the telecommunication channel or from the computer memory. If the MACs are not equal, the resulting plain text blocks Tp(1), Tp(2), ..., Tp(M) are considered false.
contents.zh-CHS: 加密数据Tc（1），Tc（2），…，Tc（M）在到达时从得到的纯文本块Tp（1），Tp（2），…，Tp（M）中解密。MAC I’（l）按照第5.3小节中的描述生成，并与与从电信信道或计算机存储器接收的加密数据一起接收的MAC I（l）进行比较。如果mac不相等，则生成的纯文本块Tp（1）、Tp（2）、…、Tp（M）被视为假。

contents.text: The MAC I(l) (I'(l)) can be generated either before encryption (after decryption, respectively) of the whole message or simultaneously with the encryption (decryption) in blocks. The first plain text blocks, used in the MAC generation, can contain service information (the address section, a time mark, the initialisation vector, etc.) and they may be unencrypted.
contents.zh-CHS: maci（l）（I’（l））可以在对整个消息进行加密之前（分别在解密之后）生成，也可以与块中的加密（解密）同时生成。MAC生成中使用的第一个纯文本块可以包含服务信息（地址部分、时间标记、初始化向量等），并且可以不加密。

contents.text: The parameter l value (the bit length of the MAC) is defined by the actual cryptographic requirements, while considering that the possibility of imposing false data is 2^-l.
contents.zh-CHS: 参数l值（MAC的位长度）由实际密码要求定义，同时考虑到施加虚假数据的可能性为2^-l。
